item.title: KEEP GETTING THIS FU***** Error Please Someone Help
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

<?PHP
define('DB_HOST', 'localhost');
define('DB_NAME', 'stored');
define('DB_USERNAME', 'rooot');
define('DB_PASSWORD', 'lolwut');
$odb = new PDO('mysql:host=' . DB_HOST . ';dbname=' . DB_NAME, DB_USERNAME, DB_PASSWORD);

$sql = $odb->query("SELECT `url` FROM `sitelink` LIMIT 1");
$urlsite = $sql->fetchColumn(0);

$sql = $odb->query("SELECT `theme` FROM `sitetheme` LIMIT 1");
$sitetheme = $sql->fetch();

?>

try this and cross your fingers.

Read full topic

item.title: KEEP GETTING THIS FU***** Error Please Someone Help
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

PDO::query returns a pdostatement or false on failure, your script must be failing because you’re trying to call to an object on a boolean value.

<?PHP

define('DB_NAME', 'stored');

define('DB_PASSWORD', 'lolwut');

$odb = new PDO('mysql:host=' . DB_HOST . ';dbname=' . DB_NAME, DB_USERNAME, DB_PASSWORD);

$urlsite = $odb->query("SELECT `url` FROM `sitelink` LIMIT 1")->fetchColumn();

$sitetheme = $odb->query("SELECT `theme` FROM `sitetheme` LIMIT 1")->fetchColumn();

?>
